A Customer.happy:
Oh what a lovely burger you gave me!
Thank you!
A Customer.neutral: You sure you don't miss a thing or two in this burger...?
A Customer.angry:
Hey, I don't think I ordered this...
*The customer pushes the burger back to you*

Captain Australia.happy:
WOW! That's one bloody awesome burger!
Better than Maccas for sure! Ta!
Captain Australia.neutral:
Hey mate, you sure this burger is mine..?
*Captain thinks you are being dodgy...*
Captain Australia.angry:
...
Are you sure YOU want ME to PAY for THIS..?
*Captain is flexing his muscle while looking directly into your soul...*

John Citizen.happy: Wonderful! Now, this is what you call a burger-to-die-for!
John Citizen.neutral: Excuse me, this burger seems unsophisticated to me...
John Citizen.angry: Are you sure this burger is legit? Do you even pay tax? *John seems angry*

Jane Citizen.happy: Woo-hoo! This burger will give me strength to face John tomorrow!
Jane Citizen.neutral:
Ermm... This burger looks wrong..?
But I already gave half of it to John...
Jane Citizen.angry:
Noooo... Why are you being mean?
You are not John... *Jane covers her face and walks away*

Scott Morris.happy:
Oh wow, you made a delicously-hand-stacked burger!
Let me shake your hands!
Scott Morris.neutral:
I thought this burger was mine...
But, it looks like it belongs to someone else..?
Scott Morris.angry:
Stop! Just! Stop!
This is ridiculous!
This is un-Australian!

The Mighty Princess.happy:
Aww.. You've done well, my dear law abiding citizen.
Here, claim your reward!
*The Mighty Princess throws you a gold bullion*
The Mighty Princess.neutral:
Is this what they call a burger..?
Or, is it just me being too entitled..?
*The Mighty Princess looks confused*
The Mighty Princess.angry:
YOU! *gestures angrily*
I'm the Princess!
You do what I say!
*The Mighty Princess starts climbing the counter top...*

Donald T..happy:
You did it! You are now a member of my fans club!
Here, take my money!
Donald T..neutral:
Meh, I could build a better burger shop in this area.
*Donald T. shrugs his shoulders*
Donald T..angry:
WHAT IS THIS!
I'm going to build a wall here.
And, YOU are going to pay for it!

Mickey M..happy:
Oh boy! This is nice!
Thank you, burger shop owner!
*Mickey M. leaves a signature on the counter top*
Mickey M..neutral:
Hmm... I think this burger is not what I'm after...
*Mickey M. shakes his head. He looks confused*
Mickey M..angry:
Hmph... I'm glad I didn't ask my wife to try this burger!
And, no! I don't know Donald T.!
*Mickey M. tries to look angry*

Unicorn.happy:
Yay! A burger for me! Thank you!
I'm going to paint a rainbow for you!
Unicorn.neutral:
Eh? This doesn't look like my order..?
*Unicorn's rainbow looks fading*
Unicorn.angry: *Unicorn dashes out of the store crying out rainbow tears*

A Robot.happy:
Beep... Good... You restore my faith in humanity...
*Robot pays in bitcoins*
A Robot.angry:
BEEE-EEP! BEEEEEEE-EEP! EEEEEEPPPP!
*Robot malfunctions and grows into a giant robot*
